ModMetadata.Name: LibConstruct
ModMetadata.Author: tom_is_unlucky
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]LibConstruct[/h1] This is a library for custom placement in Stationeers. It does nothing on its own but provides functionality to other mods.
[url=https://github.com/tsholmes/StationeersLibConstruct]Source on Github[/url] This requires BepInEx and a modloader installed. Try out [url=https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad]StationeersLaunchPad[/url]. (also compatible with StationeersMods)
